message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a treasure that has been meticulously crafted and carries a special significance. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a price of $750000. I believe that this amount reflects its true worth while also allowing for a fair negotiation if needed. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
